DOC.brief_summary: Resistance training as well as creatine supplementation may increase bone mass. Therefore, the investigators speculate that resistance training combined with creatine supplementation would promote additive benefits on bone mass in elderly women with osteopenia and osteoporosis.
DOC.criteria: osteopenia and osteoporosis women older than 60 years old cardiovascular diseases or muscular disturbances precluding exercise training drugs affecting bone metabolism
